verbose_text: Consistent with this, immunofluorescence confocal microscopy showed that compared with control (MX) cells, ectopic expression of YAP1 or YAP S127A not only reduced the signal intensity of total STAT1 and IRF9 but also decreased the immunosignal of nuclear STAT1 and IRF9.
evidence: YAP1 or YAP S127A  not only reduced the signal intensity of total STAT1 and IRF9 but also decreased the immunosignal of nuclear STAT1
